text: Visualize a whimsical scene of a green frog with expressive yellow eyes equipped with swimming goggles. The frog finds itself in a common human situation: it is sitting in a calm office environment. It is perched comfortably at a modern glass desk, its webbed fingers awkwardly posed over the keys of a sleek silver laptop. Scattered around the desk are typical office items â€“ a porcelain mug filled with steaming hot coffee, a stack of various documents and a digital clock displaying the time. Through a nearby window, the subtle hues of an evening sunset fill the room.
